TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Uganda, title = Uganda, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uganda} }

S.FORM: = Uganda = Gaga kska Meycow ka Uganda, 1 00 N, 32 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 241,038 sq km(hangan na o Tg81) (knlbanga dxgal o 197,100 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 43,938 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 38,319,241 hiyi. Gaga Kampala ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 9 idas 10 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Uganda ga wada sugan 71.20% ka dxgal qpahan, 14.50% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 14.30% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Yoweri Museveni, pnaah hngkawas1986 idas 1 jiyax 29pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Uganda = Uganda Konghkwo (Kari Swasiri: Jamhuri ya Uganda, kari Ingkoku: Republic of Uganda) splawa dha Uganda, kiya ka wa mniq Tunarac Afrika na qnlhangan kcka dxral, ntumal Pnsliyan Islam Kaygi. Ri-s Ana so ssediq mnniq Uganda hniti tuqar u malu bhraun dhuq brah kongweyn kngkawas 1000, binaw quri so sediq co icil mntmay dxral hini brah bntasan niya pa, ssediq saya mkla niya u ini khbaraw. Sediq Uganda dhuq brah 1700-2300 kngkawas cida, ida kiya ppsli mumaduk niya. Babaw niya daw ya bay snpeyyah Tukcka Afrika skari Batu bujoku, miyah dhuq tuhunac qnlhangan hini tnpusu mniq, madas kkla smmalu xxiluy mi burah syakay mi pnwaya seyji, kiya u phiyu qnlhangan Kitara. Ceng-c Soto saya pa weynso qnlhangan mi pusu tunux mpdudul seyhu uri; soto ka smkaul taxa congri dmayaw hyanan qmpah. Mpsalu waya qnlhangan ka kokomin taykay, niqan 445 hiyi, iyax mntxan diyax qpahun u 5 kngkawas, hbaraw hiyi ka spuda seyngkyo knbeyhing umau, niqan duma hiyi u spuda heytay mi duma pnsliyan pusa hangan. Qnnaqah Seyhu Uganda pa wada srngaw Toming Kwoci u qnnaqah bay seyhu knkana qnlangan ka seyhu Uganda uri, 10 teyngsu ka mttuku niya u wana balay 2.4 teyngsu ka nanga dha teyngsu. Singcng cyuhwa Knkana qnlhangan Uganda u psnakan 112 ka Cyu, kana Cyu niyi u pspuwan 4 Lnlingay Cyu, trahuc Cyu u phiyu Keyng. To bay psnakan pusu sangyey uxay daw alang mkbrnux singcng ka tmhangan. Ti-ri Ugan da ka qnlhangan kcka dxral, msdalih ou langu qsiya, mray so Langu Wetoriya, Langu Apot, Langu Aydhwa mi Langu Kiyaka. Knkana qnlhangan u wa mniq babaw tubaraw brnux, pndkanan haypa 900m; dxral nniqan dha u to bay knkkarac mtilux. Pusu bay alang mkbrnux u to bay wa mniq ssiyaw Langu Wetoriya, kiya ka knkana soto Kanpala uri. Dxral nniqan Uganda u wa mniq tukcka Tunarac Afrika, lmihu hmrinas Cutaw, tudaya u msqapah Tuhunac Sudan, tuiwil u tuhuy Congo Mincu Konghkwo mslutuc, tuhunac ka mtayus Tanzania mi Luanda, tunarac ka mslutuc Kenya, kiya ka kingal uka pqriyan ucilung na qnlhangan. Knkana knbeyhing dxral qnlhangan u 241,038 pinghwang km, tuhunac daya knbaraw u 644 km, tunarac iwil knlbangan u 563 km, mntna bay lktu qtan ka hnyuwan niya. Hnyuwan lnlingay Alaw wa mniq Tunarac Afrika nniqan dxral unbuhan, so kiya kcka tndxral u tubaraw ka dwiyaq mi rrbuq bay ka ayu, tunarac mi tuiwil ddha nniqan u niqan tubaraw bay dwiyaq , tuiril u niqan tubaraw dwiyaq dhuq 5120m, tnkawas mhuda ka dudux dwiyaq, ayus tuiwil ka dwiyaq Lubuncojuy u knllabang 96km, haypa 4519m. Ayus tunarac ka dudux dwiyaq Okonghong u haypa 4322m, tunarac na Kongweyn Qnlhangan mi psrmalan ssanan umaduk, knbeyhing dxral u dhuq 9526 pinghwang km. Dxral nniqan tuhunac u to bay haypa 1524m balay kiya; haypa tudaya u wana balay 610m. Quri qqsiya Kcka tndxral Uganda u niqan ou bay yayung, Yayung Katunca u mquri Langu Wetoriya qluluy. Langu Wetoriya u mquri tudaya qluluy, mquri kcka Langu Kiyaka qluluy. Langu Kiyaka u mquri tuiwil Langu Apot dungan. Tuhunac bay Langu Apot pa niqan Yayung Kahu, tudaya balay u niqan Yayung Wetoriya. Langu Apot u niqan Yayung Apot Niro, mquri ayus qnlhangan Tuhunac Sudan qluluy. Ayus tuhunac Langu Apot ka Langu Aydhwa; mniq tuiwil tndxral qnlhangan u, niqan Langu Cyoc nina. Knkkarac Afrika Telu pa ida nanaq kiya mndungus bay qtan ka lnlingay dha, Uganda u krinah bay mndungus knmalu qtan. Alaw ka kcka tndxral iiyax dwiyaq mi qsiya, so kiya knkkarac dha u ini so ktilux balay, pndkanan ka kntlxan knkkarac u ya bay sosu 15.6˚ dhuq 26.7˚ (Hwasu 60˚ dhuq 80˚) ka iyax niya, kiya mi mttuku bay qnyuxan quyux uri, knkawas knkkarac nniqan u to bay so snbliqan nniqan rbawan O Co, ana so htngayan kntlxan hidaw, binaw niqan kntltu bwihur mi tnayis quyux; pndkanan qnyuxan quyux kcka qnlhangan pa mniq hmrinas 1000 kongri. Binaw kcka tndxral qnlhangan u niqan kari bay quyu niqan doku pddayak, sediq mi tnbuwan u yahan balay pqraqil knttu, so kiya u pkhtur bay ddaun qpahun pkrana knkana qnlhangan. Cing-ci Knmalu balay ka dxral Uganda, kwangcan u niqan dong, ku uri. Qqpahan pnwalang ka pusu balay bumun keyjay, niqan 80% biyax mpqpah ka qmpah pkrana qpahan pnwalang. Alaw spuda dndulan sntamasu na dxral qmlahang ka keyjay, kiya ka pnhuma sngcan kahuy ka knou bay nngalan pila ka cuko. Qqpahan Pnwalang Mttuku balay ka qsiya Uganda, knmalu balay ka dxral, binaw uuda dha qmpah qnpahan u ida muru uuda cbiyaw, kcka qnlhangan u 82% sediq ka kasi stama mi psptama quri qqpahan pnwalang mudus (Kngkawas 1999), knlbangan dxral ndanan tmabun u niqan 42514 pinghwang km, kcka qnlhangan nngalan knkana sngcan u niqan 22.5% ka snpeyyah pnhuma pnwalang. Qpahan pnwalang u spuda pnwaya tiping mpqpah pnwalang, qpahun qnpahan u spuda qridin ka muda, pusu balay pnhuma qnpahan pa niqan kahuy, wata, wasaw puqan, ociya, sibus, qhuni nori mi kri tuiwil sar. Kiya uri u, Uganda pa phuma quri trabus, kawryang, abura pima, blbun urung miric, macu, bunga qhuni, bunga mi ssukay. Macu ka pusu bay uuqun pnsltudan sediq Uganda, nniqan knmalu dxral niya u blbun urung miric ka pusu balay uuqun, uuqun mi pphmaun u malu mn2 mehu ka 1 knkawas, qtan ka so niyi pa, quri so uuqun u uka ka ini ttuku ka kcka qnlhangan. Qqpahan tmabu Qqpahan tmabu Uganda u mrana balay uri, duma dwiyaq kcka qnlhangan u kiya ka nniqan dxral buwan, knkana qnlhangan u niqan dapa, miric, babuy. Ubal qraqil ka pusu balay sbari nganguc uri, binaw hhiyi mi miruku dapa u ini ttuku ddiyun qnlhangan dha nanaq. Qqpahan tnqcurux Qqpahan tnqcurux u mndungus balay uri, Langu qsiya mi yayung kcka qnlhangan u niqan qqcurux ka kcka qqsiya uri, to bay wa mniq Langu Wetoriya mi Langu Apot hiya ka pnyahan qqcurux, kcka qnlhangan pa niqan ya bay 5000 ka tbuwan qqcurux. Qqpahan kwang Mndungus bay ka kwang cang Uganda, binaw nou bay ka ini kri nina, pusu bay kwang cang u niqan wu, si, dong, seykay, timu, msama btunux yu, btunux rinhuy, jong, cyeyn, king, pi, ging, po, sin, dan mi rinswanyeyn. Kongyey Kongyey Uganda u wada mrana balay uri, wata, kahuy, mpsalu sato mi kmuruc qhuni, kongyey u wisu kndudul syeyntayhwa. Spuda biyax qsiya peyyah deyngki, koba smeynto, xxiluy, qqiya sapah mi qmpi sinaw knkana kongyey u wisu mrana kana. Qqsiya mi deyngki ka lxanan bay pkrana kongyey Uganda. Cyaw-tung Ppanan rulu Uganda u mndungus sunca uri, ppanan basu mi ppanan kisya u ida so sotu Kanpala ka pusu balay mi smquri nganguc pkrana. Ppanan rulu u ida ppanan basu mi hayya ka pusu balay, knbbaraw kana elu beyhung u 70,746 km, niqan 16,272 km ka elu beyhing hndan krotan, kcka niya u niqan 915 km ka Elu beyhing hndan dha seyng, 4828km ka elu beyhing cweyntyeynho, kiya mi 13000km sngari ka tu2 malu elu beyhing. Knkana knbbaraw elu kisya ka 1244km. Ana so uka trduwan asu ka Uganda, binaw mndungus balay ka ppana asu kcka dxral, asu Langu Wetoriya u malu ppwaluk qnlhangan Kenya mi Tanzania, Langu Apot u malu lmutuc musa Kango, Langu Kiyaka mi mmusa Langu Apot ka Yayung Niro u to bay niqan ppanan asu kana, asu panan sediq mi asu mhaqun qqiya u tqapur balay qtan. Snlhayan snhiyan Kngkkawas 1860, Kiristo kyo mi Islam kyo u swarang dhuq Uganda. Spuda kngkawas 2002 mnhdu smpu knhbrawan hiyi sediq, niqan 85% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka Kuriscyang. Quri so sinjya pa, Roma Teyns Kyo ka 41.9% hiyi sediq, hiti daw Burah Kyo ka 35.9%, tikuh balay sinjya ka Tongcng Kyo, 12.1% knhbrawan hiyi sinjya ka Muslim. Uganda ka knkana kcka qnlhangan qnlangan tu2 tikuh bay kngkawas weysu qnlhangan, kngkawas 2014 u wana balay 15.5 kngkawas. Kari Ou bay joku ka Uganda, kcka u uka ka mabang bay hbaraw joku. So kiya ana eygo ka kari ddiyun seyhu, binaw ou balay kluwan ka kari. Uxay wana kari Ingkoku, kari Oluganda na Bantu joku u srngaw dha balay uri, kiya u niqan sapah pyasan ka dmuwi ka dmuwi kari niyi tmsa. Bungka Bungka joku u ou kluwanan, Amin ka dmuwi biyax qmlahang cida u mnbiyax bay lmiwaq sediq Asia (Pusu balay ka sediq India), saya dungan u hbaraw balay sediq ka tbrinah miyah Uganda Dungan. Ttgesa Pyasan Kanpala Makayrere ka pusu balay pyasan Uganda uri. Ccamac Mndungus balay knou bay kluwanan ccamac ka Uganda, muru tunarac mkngahu Langu Aydhwa mi ssiyaw tuieil daya Langu Cyoc, kiya ka knbeyhing 1800 pinghwang km sngari na Elisabet kongweyn; kcka u niqan ou bay tqapur qalux singsing, rungay bering mi beyhing biyaq. Bbuyu congsin u niqan beyhing dapa ngucun, dapa lmiqu, rayung, lqlic mi miric ring. Mkngahu Langu ka pssliyan mniq homa mi eyu, niqan qalux sinyo, bhuway sinyo mi rqbux bbaraw waru mi kari bay lmlamu ccamac uri na, kiya mi mqliyang rakaw ubal niya ka qduda lalay, ingwu mqbulic mi cing tunux kwan mi ou kluwanan qqduda.

= Uganda = Gaga kska Meycow ka Uganda, 1 00 N, 32 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 241,038 sq km(hangan na o Tg81) (knlbanga dxgal o 197,100 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 43,938 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 38,319,241 hiyi. Gaga Kampala ka poso alang paro, jiyax 9 idas 10 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Uganda ga wada sogan 71.20% ka dxgal qpahan, 14.50% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 14.30% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Yoweri Moseveni, pnaah hngkawas1986 idas 1 jiyax 29pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Uganda = Uganda Konghkwo (Kari Swasiri: Jamhori ya Uganda, kari Ingkoko: Repoblic of Uganda) splawa dha Uganda, kiya ka wa mniq Tonarac Afrika na qnlhangan kcka dxral, ntomal Pnsliyan Islam Kaygi. Ri-s Ana so ssediq mnniq Uganda hniti toqar o malo bhraon dhoq brah kongweyn kngkawas 1000, binaw qori so sediq co icil mntmay dxral hini brah bntasan niya pa, ssediq saya mkla niya o ini khbaraw. Sediq Uganda dhoq brah 1700-2300 kngkawas cida, ida kiya ppsli momadok niya. Babaw niya daw ya bay snpeyyah Tokcka Afrika skari Bato bojoko, miyah dhoq tohonac qnlhangan hini tnposo mniq, madas kkla smmalo xxiloy mi borah syakay mi pnwaya seyji, kiya o phiyo qnlhangan Kitara. Ceng-c Soto saya pa weynso qnlhangan mi poso tonox mpdodol seyho ori; soto ka smkaol taxa congri dmayaw hyanan qmpah. Mpsalo waya qnlhangan ka kokomin taykay, niqan 445 hiyi, iyax mntxan diyax qpahon o 5 kngkawas, hbaraw hiyi ka spoda seyngkyo knbeyhing omao, niqan doma hiyi o spoda heytay mi doma pnsliyan posa hangan. Qnnaqah Seyho Uganda pa wada srngaw Toming Kwoci o qnnaqah bay seyho knkana qnlangan ka seyho Uganda ori, 10 teyngso ka mttoko niya o wana balay 2.4 teyngso ka nanga dha teyngso. Singcng cyohwa Knkana qnlhangan Uganda o psnakan 112 ka Cyo, kana Cyo niyi o pspowan 4 Lnlingay Cyo, trahoc Cyo o phiyo Keyng. To bay psnakan poso sangyey oxay daw alang mkbrnox singcng ka tmhangan. Ti-ri Ugan da ka qnlhangan kcka dxral, msdalih oo lango qsiya, mray so Lango Wetoriya, Lango Apot, Lango Aydhwa mi Lango Kiyaka. Knkana qnlhangan o wa mniq babaw tobaraw brnox, pndkanan haypa 900m; dxral nniqan dha o to bay knkkarac mtilox. Poso bay alang mkbrnox o to bay wa mniq ssiyaw Lango Wetoriya, kiya ka knkana soto Kanpala ori. Dxral nniqan Uganda o wa mniq tokcka Tonarac Afrika, lmiho hmrinas Cotaw, todaya o msqapah Tohonac Sodan, toiwil o tohoy Congo Minco Konghkwo mslotoc, tohonac ka mtayos Tanzania mi Loanda, tonarac ka mslotoc Kenya, kiya ka kingal oka pqriyan ocilong na qnlhangan. Knkana knbeyhing dxral qnlhangan o 241,038 pinghwang km, tohonac daya knbaraw o 644 km, tonarac iwil knlbangan o 563 km, mntna bay lkto qtan ka hnyowan niya. Hnyowan lnlingay Alaw wa mniq Tonarac Afrika nniqan dxral onbohan, so kiya kcka tndxral o tobaraw ka dwiyaq mi rrboq bay ka ayo, tonarac mi toiwil ddha nniqan o niqan tobaraw bay dwiyaq , toiril o niqan tobaraw dwiyaq dhoq 5120m, tnkawas mhoda ka dodox dwiyaq, ayos toiwil ka dwiyaq Loboncojoy o knllabang 96km, haypa 4519m. Ayos tonarac ka dodox dwiyaq Okonghong o haypa 4322m, tonarac na Kongweyn Qnlhangan mi psrmalan ssanan omadok, knbeyhing dxral o dhoq 9526 pinghwang km. Dxral nniqan tohonac o to bay haypa 1524m balay kiya; haypa todaya o wana balay 610m. Qori qqsiya Kcka tndxral Uganda o niqan oo bay yayong, Yayong Katonca o mqori Lango Wetoriya qloloy. Lango Wetoriya o mqori todaya qloloy, mqori kcka Lango Kiyaka qloloy. Lango Kiyaka o mqori toiwil Lango Apot dongan. Tohonac bay Lango Apot pa niqan Yayong Kaho, todaya balay o niqan Yayong Wetoriya. Lango Apot o niqan Yayong Apot Niro, mqori ayos qnlhangan Tohonac Sodan qloloy. Ayos tohonac Lango Apot ka Lango Aydhwa; mniq toiwil tndxral qnlhangan o, niqan Lango Cyoc nina. Knkkarac Afrika Telo pa ida nanaq kiya mndongos bay qtan ka lnlingay dha, Uganda o krinah bay mndongos knmalo qtan. Alaw ka kcka tndxral iiyax dwiyaq mi qsiya, so kiya knkkarac dha o ini so ktilox balay, pndkanan ka kntlxan knkkarac o ya bay soso 15.6˚ dhoq 26.7˚ (Hwaso 60˚ dhoq 80˚) ka iyax niya, kiya mi mttoko bay qnyoxan qoyox ori, knkawas knkkarac nniqan o to bay so snbliqan nniqan rbawan O Co, ana so htngayan kntlxan hidaw, binaw niqan kntlto bwihor mi tnayis qoyox; pndkanan qnyoxan qoyox kcka qnlhangan pa mniq hmrinas 1000 kongri. Binaw kcka tndxral qnlhangan o niqan kari bay qoyo niqan doko pddayak, sediq mi tnbowan o yahan balay pqraqil kntto, so kiya o pkhtor bay ddaon qpahon pkrana knkana qnlhangan. Cing-ci Knmalo balay ka dxral Uganda, kwangcan o niqan dong, ko ori. Qqpahan pnwalang ka poso balay bomon keyjay, niqan 80% biyax mpqpah ka qmpah pkrana qpahan pnwalang. Alaw spoda dndolan sntamaso na dxral qmlahang ka keyjay, kiya ka pnhoma sngcan kahoy ka knoo bay nngalan pila ka coko. Qqpahan Pnwalang Mttoko balay ka qsiya Uganda, knmalo balay ka dxral, binaw ooda dha qmpah qnpahan o ida moro ooda cbiyaw, kcka qnlhangan o 82% sediq ka kasi stama mi psptama qori qqpahan pnwalang modos (Kngkawas 1999), knlbangan dxral ndanan tmabon o niqan 42514 pinghwang km, kcka qnlhangan nngalan knkana sngcan o niqan 22.5% ka snpeyyah pnhoma pnwalang. Qpahan pnwalang o spoda pnwaya tiping mpqpah pnwalang, qpahon qnpahan o spoda qridin ka moda, poso balay pnhoma qnpahan pa niqan kahoy, wata, wasaw poqan, ociya, sibos, qhoni nori mi kri toiwil sar. Kiya ori o, Uganda pa phoma qori trabos, kawryang, abora pima, blbon orong miric, maco, bonga qhoni, bonga mi ssokay. Maco ka poso bay ooqon pnsltodan sediq Uganda, nniqan knmalo dxral niya o blbon orong miric ka poso balay ooqon, ooqon mi pphmaon o malo mn2 meho ka 1 knkawas, qtan ka so niyi pa, qori so ooqon o oka ka ini ttoko ka kcka qnlhangan. Qqpahan tmabo Qqpahan tmabo Uganda o mrana balay ori, doma dwiyaq kcka qnlhangan o kiya ka nniqan dxral bowan, knkana qnlhangan o niqan dapa, miric, baboy. Ubal qraqil ka poso balay sbari ngangoc ori, binaw hhiyi mi miroko dapa o ini ttoko ddiyon qnlhangan dha nanaq. Qqpahan tnqcorox Qqpahan tnqcorox o mndongos balay ori, Lango qsiya mi yayong kcka qnlhangan o niqan qqcorox ka kcka qqsiya ori, to bay wa mniq Lango Wetoriya mi Lango Apot hiya ka pnyahan qqcorox, kcka qnlhangan pa niqan ya bay 5000 ka tbowan qqcorox. Qqpahan kwang Mndongos bay ka kwang cang Uganda, binaw noo bay ka ini kri nina, poso bay kwang cang o niqan wo, si, dong, seykay, timo, msama btonox yo, btonox rinhoy, jong, cyeyn, king, pi, ging, po, sin, dan mi rinswanyeyn. Kongyey Kongyey Uganda o wada mrana balay ori, wata, kahoy, mpsalo sato mi kmoroc qhoni, kongyey o wiso kndodol syeyntayhwa. Spoda biyax qsiya peyyah deyngki, koba smeynto, xxiloy, qqiya sapah mi qmpi sinaw knkana kongyey o wiso mrana kana. Qqsiya mi deyngki ka lxanan bay pkrana kongyey Uganda. Cyaw-tong Ppanan rolo Uganda o mndongos sonca ori, ppanan baso mi ppanan kisya o ida so soto Kanpala ka poso balay mi smqori ngangoc pkrana. Ppanan rolo o ida ppanan baso mi hayya ka poso balay, knbbaraw kana elo beyhong o 70,746 km, niqan 16,272 km ka elo beyhing hndan krotan, kcka niya o niqan 915 km ka Elo beyhing hndan dha seyng, 4828km ka elo beyhing cweyntyeynho, kiya mi 13000km sngari ka to2 malo elo beyhing. Knkana knbbaraw elo kisya ka 1244km. Ana so oka trdowan aso ka Uganda, binaw mndongos balay ka ppana aso kcka dxral, aso Lango Wetoriya o malo ppwalok qnlhangan Kenya mi Tanzania, Lango Apot o malo lmotoc mosa Kango, Lango Kiyaka mi mmosa Lango Apot ka Yayong Niro o to bay niqan ppanan aso kana, aso panan sediq mi aso mhaqon qqiya o tqapor balay qtan. Snlhayan snhiyan Kngkkawas 1860, Kiristo kyo mi Islam kyo o swarang dhoq Uganda. Spoda kngkawas 2002 mnhdo smpo knhbrawan hiyi sediq, niqan 85% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka Koriscyang. Qori so sinjya pa, Roma Teyns Kyo ka 41.9% hiyi sediq, hiti daw Borah Kyo ka 35.9%, tikoh balay sinjya ka Tongcng Kyo, 12.1% knhbrawan hiyi sinjya ka Moslim. Uganda ka knkana kcka qnlhangan qnlangan to2 tikoh bay kngkawas weyso qnlhangan, kngkawas 2014 o wana balay 15.5 kngkawas. Kari Oo bay joko ka Uganda, kcka o oka ka mabang bay hbaraw joko. So kiya ana eygo ka kari ddiyon seyho, binaw oo balay klowan ka kari. Uxay wana kari Ingkoko, kari Ologanda na Banto joko o srngaw dha balay ori, kiya o niqan sapah pyasan ka dmowi ka dmowi kari niyi tmsa. Bongka Bongka joko o oo klowanan, Amin ka dmowi biyax qmlahang cida o mnbiyax bay lmiwaq sediq Asia (Poso balay ka sediq India), saya dongan o hbaraw balay sediq ka tbrinah miyah Uganda Dongan. Ttgesa Pyasan Kanpala Makayrere ka poso balay pyasan Uganda ori. Ccamac Mndongos balay knoo bay klowanan ccamac ka Uganda, moro tonarac mkngaho Lango Aydhwa mi ssiyaw toieil daya Lango Cyoc, kiya ka knbeyhing 1800 pinghwang km sngari na Elisabet kongweyn; kcka o niqan oo bay tqapor qalox singsing, rongay bering mi beyhing biyaq. Bboyo congsin o niqan beyhing dapa ngocon, dapa lmiqo, rayong, lqlic mi miric ring. Mkngaho Lango ka pssliyan mniq homa mi eyo, niqan qalox sinyo, bhoway sinyo mi rqbox bbaraw waro mi kari bay lmlamo ccamac ori na, kiya mi mqliyang rakaw obal niya ka qdoda lalay, ingwo mqbolic mi cing tonox kwan mi oo klowanan qqdoda.
